metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9071 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. It is a stack consumption issue in d_count_templates_scopes in cp-demangle.c after many recursive calls.

notes.Note: sbeattie> upstream notes this issue is in libiberty same fix as CVE-2019-9070

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
